Action.author: harrisob@us.ibm.com
Action.body: All actions will have offline signing with the new low level

Action.author: harrisob@us.ibm.com
Action.body: ~simonstone1 ~heatherp ~andrew-coleman Do we want to do this

Action.author: heatherp
Action.body: Not sure when we'd tackle it, but it sounds like from speaking to Dave, it would be beneficial for the high level API to do this

Action.author: davidkel
Action.body: Doesn't appear to have any interest yet for the high level. It's available in the low level api.
